# INDefaultCardTemplate

**Class**

A card template for customizing the Siri watch face for a shortcut.

## Declaration

```swift
class INDefaultCardTemplate
```

## Overview

The Siri watch face displays a relevant shortcut using information from the [doc://com.apple.sirikit/documentation/Intents/INIntent] or [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Foundation/NSUserActivity] provided when creating the shortcut. If you want to provide watch specific information—for example, to display a shorter title—provide the relevant shortcut a default card template by setting the [doc://com.apple.sirikit/documentation/Intents/INRelevantShortcut/watchTemplate] property. The template allows your app to set the [doc://com.apple.sirikit/documentation/Intents/INDefaultCardTemplate/title], [doc://com.apple.sirikit/documentation/Intents/INDefaultCardTemplate/subtitle], and [doc://com.apple.sirikit/documentation/Intents/INDefaultCardTemplate/image]. For more information, see [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/SiriKit/displaying-shortcut-information-in-a-siri-watch-face-card].



## Creating a Default Card Template

- **init(title:)**: Creates a default card template with the specified title.

## Managing Template Information

- **title**: The title displayed in the Siri watch face card.
- **subtitle**: The subtitle displayed in the Siri watch face card.
- **image**: The image displayed in the Siri watch face card.

## Siri watch face

- **Displaying Shortcut Information in a Siri Watch Face Card**: Display and customize watch-specific shortcut information with a default card template.
- **Defining Relevant Shortcuts for the Siri Watch Face**: Inform Siri when your app’s shortcuts may be useful to the user.
- **INRelevantShortcut**: An object that defines a shortcut and its relevance to the user.
- **INRelevantShortcutStore**: An object that saves relevant shortcuts.
